issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A fix has been committed, and will be part of the next release
status.name: Release Pending

fields.description:
The bootstrap webservices properties defaults are mismatched for:

* bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_max_threads
* bootstrap.webservices.listener_address_match

causing an unnecessary reload on bootstrap:

{code}
Fri May 26 15:02:59 2017  INFO [WebServices:eucalyptus-bootstrap-listenerregistry-listenertasks-worker-204] bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_max_threads has changed: oldValue = 128, newValue = 32
Fri May 26 15:02:59 2017  INFO [WebServices:eucalyptus-bootstrap-listenerregistry-listenertasks-worker-204] bootstrap.webservices.listener_address_match has changed: oldValue = , newValue = 0.0.0.0
{code}

we should update the defaults for consistency to avoid listener restart.
fields.summary: Web services properties mismatched defaults for server_pool_max_threads listener_address_match

comments.body:
We no longer restart the listener when configuration has the default values.

We should also verify that modifying configuration is still functional, e.g. change configuration:

{code}
# euctl bootstrap.webservices.port=80
{code}

and verify that all hosts use the new port within a minute and also after a eucalyptus-cloud service restart:

{code}
# netstat -ntlp | grep eucalyptus
tcp        0      0 10.111.5.153:8779       0.0.0.0:*               LISTEN      8360/eucalyptus-clo 
tcp        0      0 0.0.0.0:80              0.0.0.0:*               LISTEN      8360/eucalyptus-clo 
tcp        0      0 10.107.105.153:53       0.0.0.0:*               LISTEN      8360/eucalyptus-clo 
tcp        0      0 10.111.5.153:53         0.0.0.0:*               LISTEN      8360/eucalyptus-clo 
tcp        0      0 127.0.0.1:8773          0.0.0.0:*               LISTEN      8360/eucalyptus-clo 
tcp        0      0 10.111.5.153:8773       0.0.0.0:*               LISTEN      8360/eucalyptus-clo 
{code}

Note: bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_max_threads does not report a default value for the property. 
The properties are no longer appearing in the logs as changed/updated during init. 

{code}
In [16]: tc.sysadmin.show_properties('bootstrap.webservices.listener_address_match')
[2017-08-08 19:34:03,247][INFO][SystemConnection]: 
+--------------------------------------------+--------------+-------+--+----------------------------------------+
|PROPERTY NAME                               |PROPERTY VALUE|DEFAULT|RO|DESCRIPTION                             |
+--------------------------------------------+--------------+-------+--+----------------------------------------+
|bootstrap.webservices.listener_address_match|0.0.0.0       |0.0.0.0|F |CIDRs matching addresses to bind on     |
|                                            |              |       |  |(note: default interface is always bound|
|                                            |              |       |  |regardless).                            |
+--------------------------------------------+--------------+-------+--+----------------------------------------+


In [17]: tc.sysadmin.show_properties('bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_max_threads')
[2017-08-08 19:34:05,921][INFO][SystemConnection]: 
+---------------------------------------------+--------------+-------+--+------------------------------+
|PROPERTY NAME                                |PROPERTY VALUE|DEFAULT|RO|DESCRIPTION                   |
+---------------------------------------------+--------------+-------+--+------------------------------+
|bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_max_threads|32            |       |F |Server worker thread pool max.|
+---------------------------------------------+--------------+-------+--+------------------------------+

In [18]: clc.sys( grep server_pool_max_threads /var/log/eucalyptus/*)
cloud-debug.log:Wed Aug 2 09:02:13 2017  INFO [PropertiesDiscovery:main] --> Registered property: bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_max_threads
cloud-debug.log:Wed Aug 2 09:02:13 2017  INFO [PropertiesDiscovery:main] --> Registered property: dns.server_pool_max_threads
cloud-output.log:2017-08-02 09:02:13  INFO | --> Registered property: bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_max_threads
cloud-output.log:2017-08-02 09:02:13  INFO | --> Registered property: dns.server_pool_max_threads


In [26]: clc.sys('service eucalyptus-cloud restart')
[2017-08-08 19:40:04,275][DEBUG][10.111.5.164:(['CLC'])]: [root@10.111.5.164]# service eucalyptus-cloud restart
[2017-08-08 19:40:04,680][DEBUG][10.111.5.164:(['CLC'])]: 
Redirecting to /bin/systemctl restart  eucalyptus-cloud.service
{code}

Note: Values are retained through reboot...
{code}
[2017-08-08 19:40:27,950][DEBUG][10.111.5.164:(['CLC'])]: done with exec
Out[26]: ['Redirecting to /bin/systemctl restart  eucalyptus-cloud.service'] 


In [27]: prop = tc.sysadmin.get_property('bootstrap.webservices.listener_address_match')

In [28]: prop.show()
[2017-08-08 19:48:58,301][INFO][SystemConnection]: 
+--------------------------------------------+--------------+-------+--+----------------------------------------+
|PROPERTY NAME                               |PROPERTY VALUE|DEFAULT|RO|DESCRIPTION                             |
+--------------------------------------------+--------------+-------+--+----------------------------------------+
|bootstrap.webservices.listener_address_match|10.111.5.164  |0.0.0.0|F |CIDRs matching addresses to bind on     |
|                                            |              |       |  |(note: default interface is always bound|
|                                            |              |       |  |regardless).                            |
+--------------------------------------------+--------------+-------+--+----------------------------------------+


In [29]: prop = tc.sysadmin.get_property('bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_max_threads')

In [30]: prop.show()
[2017-08-08 19:49:14,532][INFO][SystemConnection]: 
+---------------------------------------------+--------------+-------+--+------------------------------+
|PROPERTY NAME                                |PROPERTY VALUE|DEFAULT|RO|DESCRIPTION                   |
+---------------------------------------------+--------------+-------+--+------------------------------+
|bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_max_threads|64            |       |F |Server worker thread pool max.|
+---------------------------------------------+--------------+-------+--+------------------------------+
{code}


Note:  Local and remote hosts pick up changes, and persist service restart

{code}
n [74]: prop.modify_value(8090)
[2017-08-08 20:04:31,314][INFO][SystemConnection]: 
+--------------------------+--------------+-------+--+
|PROPERTY NAME             |PROPERTY VALUE|DEFAULT|RO|
+--------------------------+--------------+-------+--+
|bootstrap.webservices.port|8090          |None   |? |
+--------------------------+--------------+-------+--+


In [77]: out = clc.sys('netstat -ntlp | grep 8090')
[2017-08-08 20:04:46,008][DEBUG][10.111.5.164:(['CLC'])]: [root@10.111.5.164]# netstat -ntlp | grep 8090
[2017-08-08 20:04:46,229][DEBUG][10.111.5.164:(['CLC'])]: 

[2017-08-08 20:04:46,279][DEBUG][10.111.5.164:(['CLC'])]: done with exec

[2017-08-08 20:04:48,025][DEBUG][10.111.5.164:(['CLC'])]: 
tcp        0      0 10.111.5.164:8090       0.0.0.0:*               LISTEN      21500/eucalyptus-cl
